note.p: Welsh landowner. Educated at Christ Church, Oxford. Married Gertrude Jane Mary, née Godsal, 1848. Succeeded to estates at Rhagatt, Merionethshire, and Berth, Denbighshire, 1859. High sheriff of Denbigh, 1863.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/4311/34/2)
County families 1865, 1868 (s.v. Lloyd, Edward Owen Vaughan)
>Cheshire parish registers, 1538–2000, for John Lloyd (www.familysearch.org, accessed 4 March 2011)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 11 June 2015)
